title: Monthly average of heating degree days in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014 to 2019
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 12 lines namely Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov, and Dec. The y axis represents Number of days and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Jan, and Apr are gradually increasing, Dec is rapidly decreasing, May, Aug, Sep, Oct, and Nov are gradually decreasing, Feb, Mar, Jun, and Jul are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Jan mostly maintained the highest Number of days when compared to others with a mean value of 10.52, and it peaked at 2019.
Followed by Feb which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 10.2 Number of days,reaching its highest point  at 2018 with a value of 12.4.
The botommost line, Jul,  has a mean of 0.22, and peaked at 2015.
